segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen scene unfolding before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently polishing a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water is running continuously from the faucet into the single basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite shocking; the sink is completely overflowing, a sheet of water cascading down the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle is forming on the floor, already soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her dress?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains so utterly serene, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost heartbreaking to see her so oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water damage will be a real problem later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stark contrast with the calm garden outside the window is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would tell her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is building up to a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
